citation: Proclamation under the Workers Rehabilitation and Compensation Amendment Act 2009 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Workers Rehabilitation and Compensation Amendment Act 2009

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Workers Rehabilitation and Compensation Amendment Act 2009 fix 1 July 2010 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

31 May 2010

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. J. O'BYRNE

Minister for Workplace Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 9 June 2010

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
